reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 487/01: TRANSITION PROVISIONS RELATING TO THE MERGER OF TWO SCHOOL BOARDS AND THE SCHOOL BOARD BOUNDARY CHANGES MADE BY ONTARIO REGULATION 486/01
reg_info.reg_name_text: TRANSITION PROVISIONS RELATING TO THE MERGER OF TWO SCHOOL BOARDS AND THE SCHOOL BOARD BOUNDARY CHANGES MADE BY ONTARIO REGULATION 486/01

content.content: 1. (1) On January 1, 2002, The Cardiff-Bicroft Combined Roman Catholic Separate School Board is merged with and continued as the Algonquin and Lakeshore Catholic District School Board. O. Reg. 487/01, s. 1 (1). (2) Revoked: O. Reg. 487/01, s. 4.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) On January 1, 2002, The Cardiff-Bicroft Combined Roman Catholic Separate School Board is merged with and continued as the Algonquin and Lakeshore Catholic District School Board. O. Reg. 487/01, s. 1 (1).

(2) Revoked: O. Reg. 487/01, s. 4.
2. Revoked: O. Reg. 487/01, s. 4.
3. Revoked: O. Reg. 487/01, s. 4.

content.content: 4. Omitted (provides for the revocation of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 487/01, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. Omitted (provides for the revocation of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 487/01, s. 4.
